Package color

Class ColorUtil

java.lang.Object
color.ColorUtil
public class ColorUtil extends Object
Provides some useful methods to work with colors and
  • switch their components between the RGB and the YUV encoding system through the use of specific formulas and constants,
  • find the average between two colors,
  • find a color given another color and their average.

Formulas for the conversion:

R = Y + V * ((1-Wr)/Vmax);
G = Y - U * ((Wb * (1-Wb))/(Umax * Wg)) - v * ((Wr * (1-Wr))/(Vmax*Wg));
B = Y + U * ((1 - Wb)/Umax);

(Wr, Wg, Wb, Vmax, Umax constants)

  • Method Details

    • RGBtoYUV

      public static double[] RGBtoYUV​(double R, double G, double B)
      Converts the color's RGB components to YUV components through the use of specific formulas and constants.
      Parameters:
      R - the red component of the color's RGB triple.
      G - the green component of the color's RGB triple.
      B - the blue component of the color's RGB triple.
      Returns:
      the array of YUV components.

    • YUVtoRGB

      public static double[] YUVtoRGB​(double y, double u, double v)
      Converts the color's YUV components to RGB components through the use of specific formulas and constants.
      Parameters:
      y - the luminance (Y) component of the color's YUV triple.
      u - the blueness (U) component of the color's YUV triple.
      v - the redness (V) component of the color's YUV triple.
      Returns:
      the array of RGB components.

    • getMidPoint

      public static double[] getMidPoint​(double u1, double v1, double u2, double v2)
      Finds the middle point between two points on the chrominance plane UV given the coordinates.
      Parameters:
      u1 - blue (U) component of the first point in the chrominance plane.
      v1 - red (V) component of the first point in the chrominance plane.
      u2 - blue (U) component of the second point in the chrominance plane.
      v2 - red (V) component of the second point in the chrominance plane.
      Returns:
      the array with blue (U) and red (V) components of the middle point between two points on the chrominance plane UV.

    • getEndPoint

      public static double[] getEndPoint​(double uX, double vX, double u3, double v3)
      Finds the endpoint given a starting point and the middle point between them on the chrominance plane UV.
      Parameters:
      uX - blue (U) component of the starting point in the chrominance plane.
      vX - red (V) component of the starting point in the chrominance plane.
      u3 - blue (U) component of the middle point in the chrominance plane.
      v3 - red (V) component of the middle point in the chrominance plane.
      Returns:
      the array with blue (U) and red (V) components of the endpoint given a point and the middle point between them on the chrominance plane UV.
